title: Air pollution: a first film
creator_credit: Norman Bean Films and Norman Bean
brief_description: This film explains that almost all of man’s activities can contribute to air pollution. It outlines the problems associated with air pollution and indicates that everyone must share in correcting pollution problems. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
